data.name: Deadly Rain Demo
data.detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD


Join our Discord to chat about the game, help with its development, and participate in the beta test and key giveaway.


About the Game


Deadly Rain is a first-person survival horror game that puts you in a terrifying fight for survival against hordes of bizarre mutants and a toxic rain in an abandoned archipelago filled with dark mysteries yet to be discovered.

Synopsis:

You are the last survivor of a terrifying archipelago, your only objective is to survive and try to understand the cause of the toxic rain that infects the environment and generates mutations in living beings.

Features:

  • FPS and stealth based gameplay combining Left 4 Dead and Outlast.
  • Fight against hordes of ever bigger and stronger mutants.
  • Explore the open world of an abandoned archipelago.
  • Immersive like Amnesia, and atmospheric like Silent Hill.
  • Turn off your mic or be quiet so the mutants can't hear you.
  • Collect and save scarce ammo and gas mask filters.
  • Don't let your gas mask filter expire so you don't die intoxicated.
  • Discover dark mysteries through papers scattered across the map.
  • Realistic and terrifying graphics inspired by Resident Evil 7.
